summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of S. Andover St. from 6th Ave. S. to Airport Way S; by asphaltic paving; all in accordance with Comptroller's File No. 285136 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by Special Assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
